categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems military bases

nodes.text: The Umbaran airbase was a base used by the Umbaran militia and their Confederacy of Independent Systems allies during the Battle of Umbara. ARC trooper CT-5555 sent a Jedi Knight to hijack a Umbaran hover tank and destroy four Umbaran mobile heavy cannons, who were firing on a Republic fleet commanded by Admiral Wullf Yularen.
